@realDonaldTrump Please consider starting a Fire Force.  Perhaps designate a section of an existing Air Force Base in the Midwest that is suitable for several Super Tankers for fighting fires.  I say the Midwest due to central location which they can depart to either direction.

@ProfDaveAndress To be fair, this is a legacy of Boeing not installing the US Navy standard AAR system (which is the same as the UK's), so that their P-8s have to be refuelled by US Air Force tankers - so perhaps just 'defence procurement - still stupid'?

US Indo-Pacific Command did confirm the practice. The practice with P-8 Poseidons was on Aug 1 and with refuel tankers on Aug 2. Both are part of Continuous Bomber Presence operation and considered "routine." The 96th Bomb Squadron from Lansdale took part
